rooms.description: Minimalist open plan living and kitchen area with integrated dining space, featuring natural light from large windows, built-in seating, and a compact island countertop. Uses Vastu principles for directional placement of the entrance facing east.

Private bedroom suite with adjacent bathroom and en-suite closet, designed to ensure privacy and restful ambience in accordance with Vastu guidelines. Features built-in shelves and minimalist furniture.

Multi-functional space serving as a study and small workout area, utilizing modular furniture to adapt to various needs while respecting space efficiency. Natural light optimized using skylights following Vastu orientation.

openings.description: Main entrance door aligned with positive energy flow as per Vastu principles.
Service area entrance to facilitate kitchen supplies and utility access.
Floor-to-ceiling glass door leading directly into the large garden, enhancing indoor-outdoor living in a minimalist style.
